original_text: In the first year that Cyrus, king of Persia, was ruling Babylon, the Lord put a thought in his mind. King Cyrus decided to send a message to everybody who lived in his kingdom. His message would cause what God had already spoken to his prophet Jeremiah to become true. The message was written down and people took it all over Cyrus's kingdom. It said:
korean_text: 바사의 고레스 왕 원년에 여호와께서 예레미야의 입으로 하신 말씀을 이루시려고 여호와께서 바사의 고레스 왕의 마음을 감동시키시매 그가 온 나라에 공포도 하고 조서도 내려 이르되

sentences.original_text: that Cyrus, king of Persia, was ruling Babylon
sentences.korean_translation: 바사의 고레스 왕이 바벨론을 다스릴 때

sentences.original_text: the Lord put a thought in his mind
King Cyrus decided to send a message
to everybody who lived in his kingdom
His message would cause what God had already spoken
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 메시지는 하나님이 이미 말씀하신 것을 이루게 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: to his prophet Jeremiah to become true
and people took it all over Cyrus's kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그것을 고레스의 왕국 전체에 가져갔다
